name: Testing 'solution' function
description:
Testing 'solution' function

        The solution should strips all text that follows any
        of a set of comment markers passed in. Any whitespace at
        the end of the line should also be stripped out.

steps.name:
Enter a test string (apples, pears # and bananas
grapes
bananas !apples) and verify the output (apples, pears
grapes
bananas) vs expected (apples, pears
grapes
bananas)

c
d $e f g) and verify the output (a
c
d) vs expected (a
c
d)
